desc: Magick of the Old Ways. Organic and wild-harvested Witchcraft supplies, ritually-crafted beeswax candles, step-by-step ritual instructions. Old World Witchcraft spells for love, banishment, obstacle removal, spiritual protection, prosperity, and more. Monthly astrological influences and ritual recommendation advice.

layout.text: August 10, 2022: Moon at Perigee (orbiting closest to the Earth) in Capricorn. Pressure surrounding work and physical-plane decisions weigh heavily on the mind. Pay close attention to your thoughts. It will be too easy to let yourself go down the rabbit hole of negativity or pessimism. Stop yourself before it's too late. Stop the negative vortex and prevent the unwanted from manifesting.
